name: Banoffee Protein Milkshake
description: Get ready to shake things up! Channel your inner kid with a nostalgic banana milkshake with an adult twist. A little caffeine boost and protein powder punch keeps you satisfied and avoids that pesky sugar crash.

ingredients.name: Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend

preparation: Measure banana, ice cream, yogurt, coffee, milk, and protein blend into a blender.
Blend on high until well incorporated, about 45 sec.
Divide between two chilled glasses. Garnish with chocolate shavings, if desired.
tips: Epicure protein blends are plant-based, made with pea and fava bean protein. Make vegan milkshakes with vegan ice cream and yogurt.
For an Epic Life friendly dessert, make mini shakes. One shake will serve two Epic friends!
To chill glasses, rinse with cold water and freeze for 10 minutes.

products.name: Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend
